name: Equalizer Path
description: Persons who watching for balance between good and evil is called Equalizers, in this adventure you must help to one Equalizer by the name Smion restore this balance,  in their journey  Smion will encounter with Queen of Thousand Faces, True Rusty Personality,  Most Dangerous Paranormal of Second Paranormal Syndrome, Psychiatrist with super natural powers and hungry half-human half-squid, help to Smion defeat all obstacles on his Path, to follow his own Equalizer Path.
